Package DBAccess

Class DBCustomers

java.lang.Object
DBAccess.DBCustomers
public class DBCustomers extends Object
This class defines the method querying the database for data for the Customer class.

    Description

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    addCustomer(Customers newCustomer)
    This method updates the database by inserting into the customer table the given customer value.
    static void
    deleteCustomer(Customers customer)
    Updates the database by deleting first the appointments from the appointment table, then the customer itself from the customer table, of the customer passed to the method.
    static void
    getAllCustomers()
    This method queries the database for all data in the Customers table and adds the values into the AllCustomers ObservableList used throughout the application.
    static Customers
    lookupCustomer(int searchCustomerId)
    This method searches the allCustomers list for the customer value with the given CustomerID integer, or returns no value and displays an error indicating that no such customer was found.
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customers>
    lookupCustomer(String customerName)
    Searches the allCustomers for all values with names that start with the given String.
    static void
    updateCustomer(Customers updatedCustomer)
    This method updates the database Customer table with the given customer object matching the Customer ID found in the database.

  • Field Details

    • allCustomers

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customers> allCustomers

  • Constructor Details

    • DBCustomers

      public DBCustomers()

  • Method Details

    • getAllCustomers

      public static void getAllCustomers()
      This method queries the database for all data in the Customers table and adds the values into the AllCustomers ObservableList used throughout the application.

    • updateCustomer

      public static void updateCustomer(Customers updatedCustomer)
      This method updates the database Customer table with the given customer object matching the Customer ID found in the database.
      Parameters:
      updatedCustomer - The updated values of the customer to be pushed to the database.

    • addCustomer

      public static void addCustomer(Customers newCustomer)
      This method updates the database by inserting into the customer table the given customer value.
      Parameters:
      newCustomer - The customer object to be inserted into the database.

    • lookupCustomer

      public static Customers lookupCustomer(int searchCustomerId)
      This method searches the allCustomers list for the customer value with the given CustomerID integer, or returns no value and displays an error indicating that no such customer was found.
      Parameters:
      searchCustomerId - The ID of the customer to be found in the list.
      Returns:
      Returns the customer object, unless no value is found, then returns null.

    • lookupCustomer

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customers> lookupCustomer(String customerName)
      Searches the allCustomers for all values with names that start with the given String.
      Parameters:
      customerName - The string passed in to be searched for.
      Returns:
      A list of all customers with names that start with the given String.

    • deleteCustomer

      public static void deleteCustomer(Customers customer)
      Updates the database by deleting first the appointments from the appointment table, then the customer itself from the customer table, of the customer passed to the method. Also removes it from the local allCustomers ObservableList.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer to be deleted.
